cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Homeland Security on March 18, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 1893, Transportation Security Preparedness Act of 2021

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 47 (Friday, March 12, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. WATSON COLEMAN:
H.R. 1893.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 18: To make all Laws which
shall be necessary and proper for carrying into Execution the
foregoing Powers, and all other Powers vested by this
Constitution in the Government of the United States, or in
any Department or Officer thereof.
[Page H1365]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

title: Transportation Security Preparedness Act of 2021
